analysis.description:
ThornCloud.transferAnyERC20 (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-IERC20(_tokenAddress).transfer(_to,_amount) (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol)

ERC20.pointMultiplier should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol#217)
ThornCloud.initialSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol#487-490)
Parameter '_addr' of ERC20.allowAddress (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol#190) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_allowed' of ERC20.allowAddress (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol#190-191) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addr' of ERC20.lockAddress (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol#196) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_locked' of ERC20.lockAddress (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol#196-197) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_locked' of ERC20.setLocked (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol#201) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addr' of ERC20.canTransfer (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol#204) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addr' of ERC20.divsOwing (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol#222) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of ThornCloud.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol#493) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of ThornCloud.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_extraData' of ThornCloud.approveAndCall (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_tokenAddress' of ThornCloud.transferAnyERC20 (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of ThornCloud.transferAnyERC20 (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_amount' of ThornCloud.transferAnyERC20 (/unique_chucks/15/0xdab6e390afe60ec2460230458d050e5e89906e52.sol) is not in mixedCase
